original_text: He and all the Israelites brought the Lord's Covenant Box to Jerusalem. They shouted and they made a loud noise with trumpets.
korean_text: 다윗과 온 이스라엘 족속이 즐거이 환호하며 나팔을 불고 여호와의 궤를 메어오니라

sentences.original_text: brought the Lord's Covenant Box to Jerusalem
and they made a loud noise with trumpets
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나팔을 불어 큰 소리를 냈습니다
